rows.label: qst104703_msg001
rows.name:
今の時期だとスペルビアとグーラの間には
リベラリタスがあるから
中継地として休憩を取っているのかも(仮)

rows.label: qst104703_msg0002
rows.name:
You guys! You were talking to
Sophora before the boat left, right?

rows.label: qst104703_msg0003
rows.name:
You didn't happen to see another
Divine Beast ship on your way here by
any chance, did you?

rows.label: qst104703_msg0004
rows.name:
Oh. Dammit.
As soon as I arrived in Liberalitas,
the weather turned sour.

rows.label: qst104703_msg0005
rows.name:
And then, just my luck, we got
attacked by Cloud Sea monsters
and I lost the others.

rows.label: qst104703_msg0006
rows.name:
I want to go look for them,
but I lost Sophora along with
the ship so I can't really fight.

rows.label: qst104703_msg0007
rows.name:
You'll help?
Oh man, that would be amazing.

rows.label: qst104703_msg0008
rows.name:
I spoke to someone from Iyasaki and
they said there are no Superbian ships
between here and the Cloud Ridge.

rows.label: qst104703_msg0009
rows.name:
I know Sophora can take care of
herself, but I'm worried about the
other people on board the ship...

rows.label: qst104703_msg0101
rows.name:
Some people fight and win even
though they're not Drivers.

rows.label: qst104703_msg0102
rows.name:
And here I am, can't fight
unless I have Sophora...

rows.label: qst104703_msg0201
rows.name:
You found them?!
Sophora... She's all right?
What a relief!

rows.label: qst104703_msg0202
rows.name: The ship got stuck in the Cloud Sea?

rows.label: qst104703_msg0203
rows.name: Could you tell me exactly where?

rows.label: qst104703_msg0205
rows.name:
If I can rescue them with this
ship, we can head on to Gula.

rows.label: qst104703_msg0206
rows.name:
Some harbor people said they'd
lend a hand, so we should be
in good shape.
